title.rendered: U of T offers free LSAT prep course

content.rendered: An article featured in the May 10, 2012 edition of The Toronto Star describes the new University of Toronto Faculty of Law Law School Prep Program.  Students from low-income families with aspirations to go to law school will soon be able to enroll for free.  Alumni from the LAWS program will be given priority.
